description: From New Latin puerperālis, from Latin puerpera (“woman in childbirth”), from puer (“child”) + pariō (“I bear”).

definitionGroups.group: Of, pertaining to, or associated with the puerperium (the first month of postpartum), or, sometimes also:

entries.meaning: (broadly) Of, pertaining to, or associated with the peripartum period including childbirth.
